#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
using namespace std;
void Qsort(int*x,int first,int last);
int main()
{
    int D,n,a[101],i,j,bombs;
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    while(1)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&D,&n);
        //cout << D << " " << n << endl;
        if(n == -1 && D == -1)
            break;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        Qsort(a,1,n);
        i=1;bombs=0;
        while(i<=n)
        {
                   bombs++;
                   j=i;
                   while(i<=n && (a[i]-D<=a[j]))
                     i++;
                   j=i-1;
                   while(i<=n && (a[i] <= a[j] + D))
                     i++;
        }
        cout << bombs << endl;
        //getch();
    }
    //getch();
    return 0;
}
void Qsort(int*x,int first,int last)
{
   int temp,pivot,i,j;
   if(first<last)
   {
      pivot=x[first];
      i=first;
      j=last;
      while(i<j)
      {
         while(x[i]<=pivot&&i<last)
         {
             i++;
         }
         while(x[j]>=pivot&&j>first)
         {
         j--;
         }
         if(i<j)
         {
            temp=x[i];
            x[i]=x[j];
            x[j]=temp;
         }
       }
       temp=x[first];
       x[first]=x[j];
       x[j]=temp;
       Qsort(x,first,j-1);
       Qsort(x,j+1,last);
     }
 }
